content: पर्याप्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Obtained, got gained; <ls>U. 5. 34.</ls> {@--2@} Finished, completed. {@--3@} Full, whole, entire, complete, all; पर्याप्तचंद्रेव शरित्त्रयामा <ls>Ku. 7. 26</ls>; <ls>R. 6. 44.</ls> {@--4@} Able, competent, adequate; <ls>R. 10. 25.</ls> {@--5@} Enough, sufficient; <ls>R. 15. 11</ls>, <ls n="R.">17. 17</ls>; <ls>Ms. 11. 7.</ls> {@--6@} Large, extensive, spacious. {@--7@} Abundant, copious, many; <ls>Ku. 3. 39.</ls> --प्तं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Willingly, readily. {@--2@} To one's satisfaction. enough, sufficiently; पर्याप्तमाचामति <ls>U. 4. 1</ls> ‘drinks his fill.’ {@--3@} Fully, adequately, ably, competently.
